text.fr: Quelle est la forme de cet objet ?

content.en:
# Understanding Cylinders

A cylinder is a three-dimensional geometric shape with two parallel circular bases connected by a curved surface.

## Key Properties

- Two circular bases of equal size
- Height perpendicular to the bases
- Curved lateral surface
- Volume = œÄr¬≤h
- Surface area = 2œÄr¬≤ + 2œÄrh

## Real-world Applications

> Cylinders are found everywhere in our daily life!

- Cans and containers
- Pipes and tubes
- Engine pistons
- Columns in architecture

! Remember: The green cylinder in this scene demonstrates perfect cylindrical geometry.

### Mathematical Note

The cylinder is one of the most studied shapes in geometry due to its practical applications and mathematical properties.
